pad every group at the right interval

Source: R/utils-latency.R
pad_to_end.Rd

Perform last observation carried forward on a group by group basis. It uses guess_period to find the appropriate interval to fill-forward by. It maintains the grouping structure it recieves. It does not fill any "interior" NA values occurring in the data beforehand.

Usage

pad_to_end(x, groups, end_date, columns_to_complete = NULL)

Arguments

x

an epi_df to be filled forward.

groups

the grouping by which to fill forward

columns_to_complete

which columns to apply completion to. By default every non-key column of an epi_df
